<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Daikitsu (Lady of Foxes)](/Deities.aspx?ID=174)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, perfect a craft or trade, leave offerings for foxes, celebrate the turning of the seasons

**Anathema** Mistreat your tools, pass a beggar without giving alms, discriminate against sex workers or the lower class

**Follower Alignments**
LN, NG, N, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Pest Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=217)

- **2nd**
[Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153)

- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161)

</column>
name: Daikitsu (Lady of Foxes)
